column5: USA USA USA...all im gonna say...lol
That's funny!  Does Canada have any "castle laws" (aka you can shoot unwelcome people that intrude your house) like some of the states?
in canada you can't shoot them, as a matter of fact, the intruder could sue the home owner if he cuts his hand on the glass from the window he just broke to get inside the house
For the land of the free and the home of the brave.  Amen   Art
